lead_paragraph: Jonathan Rosen is right. Osama bin Laden would seek to destroy Israel and the United States even if the occupation of the West Bank and Gaza ended tomorrow. But America is not seeking to win over the bin Ladens. The success of our war against terrorism may depend on a coalition that includes millions of Muslims, who do indeed care about the West Bank and Gaza. M.J. Rosenberg Chevy Chase, Md.
abstract: M J Rosenberg letter comments on Jonathan Rosen's Nov 4 article on anti-Semitism and demonization of Israel in wake of Sept 11 terrorist attacks
